Posted By: occamsrazorwit (10/16/2011 12:31:21 AM)
Rating:

@RedRapist

Um, why Stuffy Doll? I'm quite aware of the countless combos with the doll, but I'm not seeing it here...? Typically, they involve focusing massive, creature-only damage all at one point (i.e. Shivan Meteor) but this just makes him a slightly bigger attacker...

@occamsrazorwit

I guess, but that requires them having a non- creature. And what if they play another, bigger creature? Or give this one trample (which ruin's stuffy doll's effectiveness)? Then you just gave them a way past your doll. I don't know. Pumping an opponent's creature with no reliable way to use it against them doesn't seem all that clever.
